pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access Data from the Massachusetts Bay Transit Authority (MBTA) Web API // Access to the MBTA's performance API for R. Creates an easy-to-use bundle of functions to work with all the built- in calls to the MBTA performance API, and some to work with the GTFS-compatible API V3 which replaced some functionality from the old performance API. Allows users to download realtime tracking data in dataframe format that is manipulable in standard R analytics functions. Pulls performance statistics in both realtime and for historical dates and trips (after July 2015).
